descriptionHtml:
My first mod! 

Adds 2 followers to the game 


Hunts-In-Shadows, female argonian, You can find her at Four Shields Tavern in Dragons Bridge 
M\\\\\\\'elfra, male khajit, You can find him at the Dead Man\\\\\\\'s Drink in Falkreath 




Hunts-In-Shadows is a sneak type person, she hides in the shadows and wont get you caught! 
M\\\\\\\'elfra is more of a combat person, he is clumsy so will need help when sneaking by someone or something but makes up for it in combat!
author: Dragon
